name: Recipe: Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Bulle Sauce Duck Breast

customize.name: Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
customize.desc: A meat dish with the fragrant fullness of fruit. After sautéeing the duck breast, slice it and plate the meat before drizzling Bulle Fruit sauce atop it. Crisp skin, sumptuous tender meat, and sauce mingling sweet and sour come together in an ensemble that is a classic Fontainian delicacy.

customize.name: Delicious Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
customize.desc: A meat dish with the fragrant fullness of fruit. The citrusy flavor of tangerine gives the succulent duck a unique, fresh sweetness. It's so irresistibly delicious that you can barely stop yourself from reaching for the next piece even before you've swallowed the last one. No matter how much Fontaine's food culture has evolved over the years, it's no surprise that this dish has always kept its place among the classics.

customize.name: Suspicious Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
customize.desc: A meat dish with the fragrant fullness of fruit. The sauce hasn't counteracted the greasiness of the duck at all — in fact, it's given it a bitter edge instead. The appetite evoked upon seeing it presented so beautifully seems to have disappeared equally as suddenly after your first bite.

customize.name: Clorinde
customize.desc: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.

customize.name: "Tagged and Bagged"
customize.desc: Clorinde's specialty. It consists of freshly caught Fowl that has been but only very slightly roasted. Your initial apprehension quickly vanishes after experiencing its tender texture and refreshing aftertaste for yourself. Anyway, Clorinde already took a bite herself. Surely your digestive system is as robust as a seasoned hunter's is... right?

customize.name: Sanguinetti
customize.desc: The host of Hotel Debord. Underneath his calm and elegant exterior, he scoffs at customers who buy the most expensive dishes in an attempt to flaunt their wealth instead of focusing on and appreciating the taste of such fine delicacies.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Bulle Sauce Duck Breast
customize.desc: A meat dish with the fragrant fullness of fruit. After sautéeing the duck breast, slice it and plate the meat before drizzling Bulle Fruit sauce atop it. Crisp skin, sumptuous tender meat, and sauce mingling sweet and sour come together in an ensemble that is a classic Fontainian delicacy.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.text: Purchase from Sanguinetti at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine
